name: Free Paperback Groundswell
description:
Add your Coffee Table Book or Paperback Groundswell Book to your cart and then add an additional Paperback copy and enter the following coupon code at checkout to get your FREE paperback copy of Groundswell:  FREEPAPERBACK

*You do not need to add this promo page to your cart... just enter the above code at checkout to reduce your purchase price by $20 for the free copy!

name: CS Shades
description: Our custom logo shades are UV protected and at a price that can't be beat!

name: Groundswell Hardback Coffee Table Book
description:
"We felt marginalized by the surfing community because we were Christians and marginalized from the church community because we were surfers."

And so CS Founder and International Director Brett Davis wrote explaining why he and a handful of teenagers in Cronulla, Sydney, Australia decided to launch Christian Surfers in 1977. Now with missions in over 30 nations, comprising over 1000 volunteer leaders spreading the love of God through all levels of surfing, it's a great story. And that story has finally been told in Groundswell. 

The photo book is a 250-page, 28 x 28cm hardcover featuring hundreds of photos, ranging from the early days in Cronulla in 1979, right up to present day CS groups internationally. The book also features a condensed history of the movement in words.

name: Groundswell Paperback Book
description:
"We felt marginalized by the surfing community because we were Christians and marginalized from the church community because we were surfers."

And so CS Founder and International Director Brett Davis wrote explaining why he and a handful of teenagers in Cronulla, Sydney, Australia decided to launch Christian Surfers in 1977. Now with missions in over 30 nations, comprising over 1000 volunteer leaders spreading the love of God through all levels of surfing, it's a great story. And that story has finally been told in Groundswell.

Groundswell is a full 250-page book, filled with stories of God using ordinary people to do extraordinary things. It is an often funny and moving story of God using people as unorganized and undesirable as surfers from the 70's and 80's to today in the furtherance of His kingdom.

name: CS Stainless Steel Coffee Tumbler
description:
This is a top of the line stainless steel, double walled coffee tumbler with a flip/latch style lid.  These DO NOT LEAK and keep liquids hot/ cold for an extended period of time because it's double walled.  Hand washing is recommended.  Now go drink your coffee in style!

Photo credit to Amy Wong

name: Custom CS Logo Beach Towel
description: This is a blue french terry cotton beach towel with our CS logo custom printed at the bottom in white ink.  Not too thin, not too thick, this will be your favorite towel for starting a conversation at the beach about who we are, what we do, and who we surf for!

name: Coastal Rise CD
description:
You may have seen an article on our site we posted a short while ago about some of our very own Christian Surfers friends that have created some beautiful music.

Their 2013 sophomore album titled Call of the Sea includes 10 tracks:  Call of the Sea; Lovely Ave; the Light; Contretemps; Home; Prime Colors; Baby; Beach Bike Bandit; In the Son; and Ghost.

Find more info including tour dates at coastalrise.com and on Facebook.

name: Lakey Peterson Zero to 100
description: Filmmaker Aaron Lieber takes us around the world in this inspiring journey that charts the rise of one the most progressive women in surfing today. 2012 US Open winner, Lakey Peterson, provides an intimate window into her life, sharing the struggles and triumphs she has faced along the way. Breathtaking cinematography and a killer soundtrack, make Zero to 100 unmissable. A true tale that will have you laughing, crying and doing push ups by the end.

name: Flux DVD
description:
FLUX is a surf film with a difference.

A Documentary of the journey of a gathering of surfers aged from 12 - 60 from different backgrounds, situations in life and heritage.

They share a love of surfing and a common faith arising from very different journeys.

Living together in New Zealand for 10 days they share surf, laughter & conversation.

You can share that journey with us

Discovering the depth and breadth of others...

The value of the individual and the value of community...
The beauty of solace and creation...
The value of generations and surfing together..

name: CS Logo Rash Guard
description: Ready for another summer?  Not yet if you don't have our custom CS Logo Rash Guard!  The chest reads Christian Surfers with a small logo and the back is a large logo only.  They are a medium thickness Nylon Spandex in white with dark grey ink.  For sizing: an average size man about 6 feet and 165 pounds would wear a medium.  A small woman's frame would fit an Extra Small as well as bigger kids.

name: CS Track Jacket
description: New for fall is a black, full zip track jacket in super soft combed ring-spun cotton.  Above the front pockets is our Christian Surfers logo and contemporary textured block lettering.  These are true to size, but they are a more modern, slim fit cut.  Please see the image below for a sizing chart.

name: Who Do You Surf For? Hoodie
description: If you weren't able to attend the Christian Surfers International Conference in the North Shore of Oahu in early November, you still have a chance to get your hands on an exclusive "jumper" aka hoodie.  The front screen print features the CSI logo and the theme of our conference "Who Do You Surf For?  The back shows off the Hawaiian Islands chain the the words say "Who Do You Surf For" in Hawaiian.  The color is a heathered navy blue, it's a unisex cut in a light weight french terry fabric.  It is pre-laundered, so it will not shrink and features thumbholes in the cuffs as well as a Mp3/Smart Phone pocket inside the right pocket with a secret eyelet to slip your ear buds through and keep them tucked under your hood!

name: Youth Grass Roots Hoodie
description: Same as the other hoodies but brown with cream sherpa lining.  Runs true to size- this would fit kids about 10 years old and up.  The main difference in fit is shorter arm length for the youth hoodies.

name: Raising a Soul Surfer
description: The story of the Hamilton family, told as only a mother could, is a vivid illustration of how a sovereign God can turn what we see as a tragedy into a hope-filled witness of His power, grace and blessing.  Hard back with lots of great family pictures.

name: The New Surfers Bible- New Testament
description: This is a New Living Translation Bible made by CSI especially for you!   Some of the featured Christians include:  CJ and Damien Hobgood, Skip Frye, Brad Whittaker, Alistair Taylor, Kahana Kalama, Tyler Hallen, John McCarthy, Al Merrick, Bethany Hamilton and more!

name: Baby/Pre-school Boy Grommet Tee
description: The little guy in your life will proudly wear this new tee showing he is a Grommet for God!  This is a light blue combed, ring spun 100% cotton tee with the CS logo tiled on the front.  These are available in the following baby lap shoulder styles:  6 month, 12 month, and 18 month short sleeve onesies; also in 6 month, 12 month, and 18 month long sleeve onesies.  Pre-school styles are as follows:  2T, 4T and 5/6T short sleeve tees; also 2T, 4T and 5/6T long sleeve tees.

name: Baby/Pre-school  Girl Menehune Tee
description:
You are never too young to start showing that you are a Menehune for the Master!  These are combed, ring-spun 100% cotton onesies/tees for the sweet baby girl in your life!  Babies styles are as follows: sleeveless 6 month, 12 month, and 18 month onesies; also in long sleeve with a lap shoulder are 6 month, 12 month and 18 month onesies.  Pre-school styles are as follows:  2T, 4T and 5/6T short sleeve tees; also in 2T, 4T and 5/6 T long sleeve tees.  

*Our cute little models are wearing the 18 month long sleeve onesie and the 2T short sleeve tee.  All girls tops have ruffles at the sleeve hems with the exception of the 18 month long sleeve onesie that you see pictured here.  All the tees have a ruffle at the bottom hem as well.

name: Menehune Long Sleeve
description: The Menehune is a unisex toddler's long sleeve tee.  Get them knowing who they surf for now.

name: Grommet Long Sleeve
description: The Grommet is a unisex baby long sleeve tee.  Super cute for the CS baby!

name: A picture is worth 1000 words...
description: Don't miss out on being a part of this movement where you can own your very own 8 x 10 inch print of this iconic Christian Surfers image.  These prints will be available for a limited time as a means to continue raising funds for the new CS Multiplication Center in St. Augustine, Florida.  The print is just the right size and just the right price... you can hang it in a kitchen, an office, a groms room, slip it in the outer cover of a school binder, in a school or work locker... the possibilities are endless!  The opportunities for you to share your faith wil be endless as well when people see this print and ask what it's about and where you got it...

name: Die Cut CS Sticker
description: This is a really high quality die cut sticker in chrome that shows up great on cars with tinted windows.  It runs about 11 x 2 1/2 inches.

name: Die Cut CS Logo Board Sticker
description:
Don't miss out on one of these board stickers since we did a limited print!  These are custom, hand cut die cut CS logo stickers in black and run about 5 inches by 7 inches... now go catch some waves and get a nice picture of our sticker on your board, email it to us, and maybe you'll end up on our site!

Check out our Mark Chu!

name: Pray for Surfers T-shirt
description: This is what we are really about.  People will ask what the Hawaiian phrase means, and as they come up they will see the translation!  This is a mens mocha brown, chocolate brown  or medium blue 100% ring spun cotton tee in a tighter fit  This tee is NOT pre-shrunk so please keep that in mind while ordering this shirt as it is also a modern slim fit.

name: Pray for Surfers Women's Tee
description: It's about time the ladies have a version of our best selling mens tee.  Pule Ia Heie Nalu means Pray for Surfers... and that's what we do.  We now have a buttery soft butter yellow tee with the text in brown with the plumeria and hibiscus flowers in green.

name: PRAY FOR SURFers Sticker
description: The sticker says it all.  This is a 3 x 6 inch waterproof sticker for your board, car, or anything else...

name: The Silver Surfer Tee
description: This is a super soft, combed ring-spun cotton tee in black with silver ink reading CSUS, our logo and the web site address on the front.  The back shows the "Silver Surfer" in a barrel.  This is a modern slimmer fit design.

name: AAA Tee
description: New for fall, Brett, our CS International Director, and Cal, our CS International US Regional Coordinator, are modeling our AAA Tee.  These two men live the CS life that is our mission and purpose:  Awakening, Awareness, and Action.  This is a more slim cut, 100% combed ring-spun cotton tee with the photos sublimated onto the shirt.  These photos even have a history; at the bottom you will see our CSUS founder Jerry Dow doing beach ministry back in 1984, you will also see on the left, a photo from a CSI conference in Sao Paulo, Brazil.  The center is an image of a surfer from Australia, the top is Paul, the new CSUS Missions Coordinator, and on the right, Kyle from CS St. Augustine digging into the word!

name: Creed
description:
When the doctrinal, ethical, and spiritual foundations of the faith are presented together, they offer a balanced model for the Christian life.

This pocket guide summarizes these foundations by studying the Ten Commandments, the Apostles' Creed, and the Lord's Prayer. Ideal as a discipleship tool to equip new believers or as a refresher for seasoned Christians, Creed provides the essentials of the faith in an easy-to-understand format.

Includes discussion questions for group discussion or personal reflection.

name: CS Board Sticker
description: This is a nice and sticky logo sticker for your stick.  No text, just our classic logo.  Now go do something fancy and get your picture taken!  About 3 inches by 4.5 inches.

name: Psalm 142:7 Beanie
description:
"Bring me out of prison so I can thank you.  The Godly will crowd around me for you are good to me."

This beanie is marked with the numbers of the first meeting of CSUS 25 years ago.  Valentine's Day... Jerry Dow couldn't have chosen a better day to start loving on surfers in the US.

name: The Answer Bible
description: This is a NIV version Bible designed to help you discover God's answers to questions about everyday issues in your live.  There are 3 simple steps to use this Bible.  Step 1:  find a topic in the Question Map.  Step 2:  Begin your search by reading the corresponding verses.  Step 3:  Make your application using the verses and a summary of the Bible's answers in the Answer Chest.  Provided by Ocean Star Ministries.

name: CS Polo 4 your "Board Meeting"
description: This is a sick updated version of the classic polo that is buttery soft with a tone on tone embroidered CS logo.  It's a grey light weight 100% Peruvian cotton that is machine washable.  Be aware that this cut is fitted.

name: Cut Metal CS Key Chain
description: One of our own talented CS Members handmade these waterjet cut metal tags just for us!

name: Ocean Star Greeting Cards
description: You have your choice of greeting cards from Ocean Star Gifts.  Each style is blank inside.  The duck diving mermaid art is by Shannon McIntyre, the boat on the shore is by Cyndi Eastburn, and the sand writing is by Christina DiMari, the author of Ocean Star.  Each style is sold separately.  Enjoy!

name: Guatemalan Seed Bracelets
description: These custom seed bracelets where purchased from a lovely Guatemalan woman named Juanita from the town Panajachel.  The local Mayan women make these for their living.  Our very own CS Staff Cal and Coral bought many to support them and in turn, offer them to you!

name: Rise Above
description: In this 90 day devotional, Bethany Hamilton shares with young girls her courage and enthusiasm for God, inspiring them to face life head-on and be strong in their faith.

name: Heart of a Soul Surfer
description: Heart of a Soul Surfer digs deep into the heart of Bethany's abiding faith in God, and tackles difficult questions such as "Why does God allow bad things to happen in our lives?"  It features exclusive surf and family footage of Bethany before and after the attack, including Bethany's first attempts at surfing with one arm, as well as her winning the 2005 NSSA National Surfing Championship just 19 months after her shark attack.  Bethany's story has been told by many different people around the world, but this is the first time she and her family have been able to share it from their heart and perspective.  This is a powerful, true story that you won't want to miss!

name: Ocean Star
description: As a child, Christina DiMari lived in a world of abuse and abandonment, betrayal and deceit.  Christina always knew she was made for more.  Finding herself mysteriously drawn to the sea, she discovered hope and healing at the edge of the ocean.  As she connected to her source of life, God began mending the broken pieces of her soul, redeeming her past, and teaching her to shine as she was created to do.

name: 2009 Women's Member Tee
description: This is the wahine's member tee given out through 2009 and the few left over are now available here!  Features 4 shades of pink and 3 lilies to remind us of Matthew 6:28.  Shirt does not run fitted to body.

name: The Naomi
description: Show your heart wearing this comfy ribbed tank in ocean blue.  This is a PRE-SHRUNK 100% ring spun cotton for a super soft feel.  This is a slim fit style so you may want to consider ordering a size up if you don't want to wear it snug.

name: The Surfer's Guide to God:  The Gospel of John
description:
The complete Gospel of John in NIV version.  

You didn't fall in love with surfing by reading about it, but by paddling out...  It's the same with Jesus.  Take the Christian Surfers Challenge...

name: Intelligent Design
description: This is a new generation tee that you will want in your closet!  This image is printed using a process called Sublimation so that the colors are infused into the fibers of shirt.  This way there is never any fading or cracking- really showing off the true colors of this photo.

name: Menehune Short Sleeve
description: Our super cute CS toddler tee now available in short sleeve with phtalate free ink- so natural against your child's skin!  Now all you have to think about is practicing writing those S's!

name: CS Bumper Sticker
description: A modern style bumper sticker- but you can put it anywhere.  About 1.5 inches by 10 inches.

name: Gospel of John- Discount Pack
description: Take part in the Gospel of John project in a big way!  This is a package of 20 Gospel of John's that can be given away at all sorts of events...

name: PRAY FOR SURFers Sticker Discount Bulk Pack
description: Our Pray for Surfers sticker in a discounted bulk package of 50 for just $25.  Clear or Black background, waterproof, 3 x 6 inches.

name: CS Board Sticker- Discount Bulk Pack
description: This is a 50 pack of our logo sticker at half the price!  Choose from 50 black and white, or 50 blue and white.  Perfect for your car, board or anywhere!

name: Healing in the Hurting Places Book
description: Healing in the Hurting Places by Karen F. Riley takes us on an emotional journey with the Lord as he uses her testimony to help us face the hurts in our lives from the past and present, allowing Him to walk with us and find the healing that can only come from Jesus.

name: The New Surfers Bible- New Testament Discount Pack
description: This is our New Testament Surfers Bible offered in a bulk pack of 20 Bibles.

name: Cutback DVD
description:
High School senior Luke Harris dreams of just one thing... pro surfing.  With his best friend Casey at his side, they have two goals:  surf and party!  But Luke's Mom and especially Dad have other ideas:  pick a college and grow up!  When Luke learns that a spot is opening up on the local surf team, he sees his big chance to prove to his parents that he can make it as a surfer and avoid being shipped off to school.

Only two things stand in Luke's way:  new surfer in town Matt who has his own eyes set on the surf team opening, and his Dad, who insists he give up his surfing dreams and get an education.  When a devastating tragedy strikes, Luke is forced to take a hard look at his life and with the help of beautiful "church girl" Emily and his Youth Pastor, he learns that there's much more to life than riding waves.

name: CS Banner
description:
A great black and red banner to hang anywhere to promote a CS chapter event!  Each corner has grommets for easy hanging.

This is available for purchase by CS Chapter Directors only.  Please contact  us at shop@christiansurfers.com to purchase.  Thanks!
